Dataset brief description: An RDF dataset (5-star data) used in the cuisine - drug analysis done in the paper ["Inferring Cuisine - Drug Interactions Using the Linked Data Approach"](http://www.nature.com/srep/2015/150320/srep09346/full/srep09346.html). The source data is taken from [DrugBank](http://wifo5-03.informatik.uni-mannheim.de/drugbank/). It is a collection of drug data which we extended with the sentiment of the food interaction (negative, positive, neutral) and linked individual drugs to certain recipes from the [Recipe Dataset](http://datahub.io/dataset/recipe-dataset). More details can be found in the open access [paper on Scientific Reports](http://www.nature.com/srep/2015/150320/srep09346/full/srep09346.html). The data has been transformed into RDF using the [Food Ontology](http://data.lirmm.fr/ontologies/food#).
